sentence.Network_en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentence.Network_cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentence.Network_en: Friendship is much more important to me than a stupid old ring!
sentence.Network_cn: 友谊对我来说可比一个破戒指重要得多！

sentence.Network_en: Estonia has done much to cultivate the friendship of western European countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱沙尼亚努力发展与西欧国家的友谊。

entry.tran: (相互之间的)友谊，友情，朋友关系
entry.def: A friendship is a relationship between two or more friends.

example.ex: Giving advice when it's not called for is the quickest way to end a good friendship...
example.tran: 在别人不需要的时候提供建议是葬送好友关系的最快方式。

example.ex: She struck up a close friendship with Desiree during the week of rehearsals...
example.tran: 在排练的一周里她和德西蕾建立了亲密的友谊。

entry.def: You use friendship to refer in a general way to the state of being friends, or the feelings that friends have for each other.

example.ex: ...a hobby which led to a whole new world of friendship and adventure.
example.tran: 打开了一片充满友谊和冒险的全新天地的爱好

entry.def: If you have someone's friendship, they are your friend.

example.ex: He had the friendship of Terry Jones and the respect of John Cleese...
example.tran: 他得到了特里·琼斯的友谊和约翰·克利斯的尊敬。

example.ex: Steve really values your friendship more than anything else.
example.tran: 史蒂夫真的把你的友谊看得比其他任何东西都重要。

entry.def: Friendship is a relationship between two countries in which they help and support each other.

example.ex: The President set the targets for the future to promote friendship with East Europe...
example.tran: 总统确定了在未来加强同东欧的互助的目标。

example.ex: They were reaching out the hand of friendship to their former adversaries of the Cold War...
example.tran: 他们向从前冷战时期的对手伸出友谊之手。

auth_sentence.content: It makes such sense, this theory of friendship.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词,表示"某种技能"; 2. 表名词,表示"某种关系,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: airman飞行员,空军+ship某种技能→n.飞行术,导航技术
horseman养马的人,骑师,马兵+ship某种技能→n.马术

stems_affixes.value_cn: 推销术,说服力,销售,推销
stems_affixes.word_buile: salsman推销员+ship某种技能→n.推销术,说服力,销售,推销
champion冠军+ship某种关系,状态→n.锦标赛;冠军赛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
stems_affixes.word_buile: citizen公民+ship某种关系,状态→n.市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
dictator专政者+ship某种关系,状态→n.独裁[权];专政
friend朋友+ship某种关系,状态→n.友谊,友好
hard艰难的+ship某种关系,状态→n.艰难,困苦
member成员+ship某种关系,状态→n.会员资格,成员资格
partner合作者+ship某种关系,状态→n.合伙企业
relation关系,联系+ship某种关系,状态→n.关系,联系

Sentence.sentence: When I look at my friendship with Joe, I wonder how many people I've known whom I never disliked, but simply didn't take the time to get to know.
What has the speaker learned from his friendship with Joe
Durable friendships can be very difficult to maintain
Friendships are not made in a day, and the computer would be more acceptable as a friend if it simulated the gradual changes that occur when one person is getting to know another.
Friendships are not made in a day, and the computer would be more acceptable as a friendif it stimulated the gradual changes that occur when one person is getting to know another

means.word_mean: 友情, 友谊, 友好

sentences.en: I valued my friendship with my classmates.
sentences.cn: 我珍视我和同学们之间的友谊。

jushi.english: The organization works to promote friendship between nations.
jushi.chinese: 该组织旨在促进各国之间的友谊。
真实的友谊应永恒不渝。

jushi.english: He held out his hand in friendship.
